summary: Cloud-based web application for peer-to-peer skill exchange. Users can teach skills they possess and learn new skills from others in a cost-effective, collaborative manner. The platform aims to be accessible, scalable, and user-friendly, connecting users with complementary skills for secure skill exchange.
architectural_notes: Cloud-based web application — must be designed for scalability and accessibility
Peer-to-peer skill exchange model — no paid content, collaborative and cost-effective
Secure peer-to-peer interactions are a core requirement
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero illustration of two people sitting across from each other exchanging knowledge, warm earthy tones, flat vector style (hero-illustration.dim_1200x500.png)
- SkillSwap brand logo mark — abstract interlocking arrows or hands motif, terracotta and sage green, minimal flat design (logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Empty state illustration for no search results — a person looking through a magnifying glass, warm earthy palette, flat vector (empty-search.dim_400x300.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a user registration and profile management system. Users must be able to create a profile with their name, bio, skills they can teach (offered skills), and skills they want to learn (wanted skills). Profiles must be stored on-chain and retrievable by user principal.
Implement a skill listing and browsing/search system. Users must be able to browse all registered users and their offered skills, and search/filter by skill name or category.

Implement a skill exchange matching system. When a user views another user's profile and their offered/wanted skills are complementary (user A wants what user B offers, and vice versa), highlight the match and allow user A to send an exchange request to user B.

Implement a secure in-platform messaging system between matched users. Only users with an accepted exchange match may exchange messages. Messages are stored on the backend and displayed in a conversation thread UI.

Implement a ratings and reviews system for completed skill exchange sessions. After an exchange, each participant can leave a numeric rating (1–5 stars) and a short text review for the other user. Aggregate ratings are displayed on user profiles.

Apply a cohesive, modern visual theme across the entire application. Use a warm, earthy color palette (e.g., terracotta, sage green, off-white) with clean sans-serif typography, generous whitespace, card-based layouts for skill listings and profiles, and subtle accent highlights for match/action states. The aesthetic should feel approachable, community-driven, and distinct from typical edtech platforms.

new_feature_requests.summary: User registration and profile management (skills offered/wanted)
Skill exchange matching system (connect users with complementary skills)
Ratings and reviews system for skill exchange sessions
